definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be exalted (‖ form (acc. to Mas.) of [[רום]] );—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[רוֹמּוּ מְעַט וְאֵינֶנּוּ]] Job 24:24 (perhaps pass. form Ges: <sup>§</sup> 67 m Bu; Du [[רֻמוֹ]]);—Pt. [[רׂמֵם]] v. [[רום]]

definitions.title: Hithpō‘l.
definitions.body: fr. [[רום]] Kö:i. 454 Ges:§ 54 c), 3 mpl. [[וַיֵּרׂ֫מוּ]] Ez Eze 10:15 (of cherubim), [[יֵרוֹ֫מּוּ]] v:Eze 10:17, [[וַיֵּרוֹ֫מּוּ]] v:Eze 10:19; Imv. mpl. [[הֵרׂ֫מוּ מִתּוֹח הָעֵדָה]] Nu 17:10 (P). p. 927
